definition: to be a guest at a dinner party/to be wined and dined (as a bribe)
variant of 吃[chi1]
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: This food is best eaten while hot. Please enjoy your meat.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜最好趁热吃请慢用。

sentences.english: Make sure to thoroughly cook any beans before giving to your parrots.
sentences.chinese: 如要给你的鸟儿吃请一定要彻底煮熟。
